message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $12,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While this product is worth significantly more to me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I think that's a very fair offer considering the value you'll be getting.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still interested in purchasing the product and I am willing to pay $10,500.
